description: Non-Material Amendment (s96a) application to Condition 34 (Green Performance Plans) to allow phased delivery of the scheme to planning permission ref: P2017/1046/FUL dated 27 April 2018.
decision_conditions:
Condition 34 of planning permission: P2017/1046/FUL dated 27/04/2018 should now read as follows:

"Prior to the commencement of development (excluding demolition) revised draft Green Performance Plans (GPP) for each phase of the development construction as shown on 1378_SK1036_170904 - Proposed Site Phasing; shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority as follows:
a.	Phase 1 works
b.	Phase 2 works
c.	Phase 3 works (commercial)
These revised Plans should provide additional detail regarding process, responsibilities and the GPP coordinator under the 'Management and Monitoring' section and under 'Arrangements for Addressing Performance'.

REASON: In the interest of addressing climate change and to secure sustainable development."
